parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent list of regions.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: Resource IDs. You can specify up to 50 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource to which the tags are added. Valid values:

*   instance: ECS instance
*   disk: disk
*   snapshot: snapshot
*   image: image
*   securitygroup: security group
*   volume: storage volume
*   eni: ENI
*   ddh: dedicated host
*   ddhcluster: dedicated host cluster
*   keypair: SSH key pair
*   launchtemplate: launch template
*   reservedinstance
*   snapshotpolicy: automatic snapshot policy
*   elasticityassurance: elasticity assurance
*   capacityreservation: capacity reservation
*   command: Cloud Assistant command
*   invocation: Cloud Assistant command execution result or file delivery result
*   activation: activation code for a Cloud Assistant managed instance
*   managedinstance: Cloud Assistant managed instance

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the reserved instance. You can specify up to 20 tags. If you specify multiple tags, the tag keys cannot be duplicated.``
